QuestData.Title: Stormglen
QuestData.Description: Our carriage drivers were told to regroup in the fishing town of Stormglen. Our scouts report there might be shelter and supplies to be found there.$B$BMeet Gwen Armstead there, she'll be in charge of taking care of our people.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Gwen Armstead in Stormglen.
QuestData.RewardText: It's good to see you made it, $n. It looks like most everybody did.$B$BWe're not doing too bad so far for an emergency evacuation.
